posts.post_content:
1887 Old Judge Marr-$150.00 (sold)
1887 Old Judge Somers-Skinned and Trimmed-SGC A-$80.00
1888 Old Judge Orr SGC 50 VG-EX 4-$350.00
1889 Old Judge George Turner (crease side to side across knees. Stamp on back)-$125.00

S/h is an additional $6.95 (certified mail). If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal gift/Friends and Family. [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].

I figured I'd get this bumped back to the top because it deserves the bump.  

It's just really nice to see someone provide a more accurate description than the TPG label.  Adding that the Somers was trimmed was cool.  If someone doesn't know OJs they may not understand the card was trimmed.  

Also, thanks for keeping the price that was listed in the description after a card was sold.

[quote name="Fred" post=1826390]I figured I'd get this bumped back to the top because it deserves the bump.  

It's just really nice to see someone provide a more accurate description than the TPG label.  Adding that the Somers was trimmed was cool.  If someone doesn't know OJs they may not understand the card was trimmed.  

Also, thanks for keeping the price that was listed in the description after a card was sold.[/QUOTE]

Thank you, Fred.
